graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:ToolsCreateMigrationInput!)
{
	toolsCreateMigration (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsGetMigrations (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsFindMigration (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	toolsFindMigrationById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:ToolsUpdateMigrationInput!)
{
	toolsUpdateMigration (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

graphql.query:
mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	toolsDeleteMigrationById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	toolsDeleteMigrations (query: $query)
	{
		id
		name
		version
		isActive
		isExecuted
		upScript
		downScript
		sort
		executedAt
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
